name: Getaway Storm
description:
Getaway Storm is a simple fun arcade racing game that quickly turns into online multiplayer chaos with friends! Surviving for as long as you can is a team effort, since anyone getting wrecked is a game over for everyone. Let's see how fast you can go and how long you can last. 😎

Features:
  • Online multiplayer with 1-5 players
  • Arcade handling/drifting physics that are just built different 😎
  • Procedural tracks
  • Audio Drive mode
  • 14 sus cars to unlock and drive 😳
  • Lots of car crashes
  • Highscore and replay system with different categories
